text: Bandeau is a clothing comprising of a strip of cloth around a woman's breasts. It is usually part of a Bikini. It is strapless, off the shoulder and sleeveless. It is commonly made by elastic materials to prevent it from slipping down or is tied/pinned at the back or front. https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english/bandeau?q=Bandeau == References == Category:Tops (clothing)
title: Bandeau
